name: Timaeus
desc: A Mondstadter who studies alchemy and seeks to educate others about alchemy's value.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
Hmm, uh, so, just as you were making your trek down the narrow mountain paths of Dragonspine, you suddenly encountered a Mitachurl wielding a huge icy shield... You know what, the story isn't important. Just start the fight already!
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: Your Support Zone starts with 1 "Timaeus" card.</color>
<color=#ccbfad>Hint: Timaeus can allow you to play Artifact Cards for free, so use this ability to optimize your use of Elemental Dice!</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. customize.name: Timaeus
customize.desc:
Timaeus, Scholar of Alchemy

"Hello there… Oh, you'd like to use the Crafting Bench? Sure, be my guest."

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
The alchemist is adjusting the deck with his chin rested in one hand as he recommends his newly-set Adventure Challenge to you.
